params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" as \\"OD_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as \\"DM_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT, " +" T_OD, " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_REG_TYP\\" = '1' " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" in (?, ?) " +" and(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" >= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" and NVL(T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", ' ') = ? " +"order by " +" T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\""
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" from " +" M_PLANT " +" where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" )"
"select " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN " +"where " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" T_OD.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" COUNT(1) " +"from " +" M_PLANT, " +" T_OD, " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_REG_TYP\\" = '1' " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" in (?, ?) " +" and(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" >= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" and NVL(T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", ' ') = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

cell.name: s_PLANT_CD
cell.description: 内部処理用工場コード

cell.description: 内部処理用オーダデマンド区分

cell.description: オーダデマンド区分 値

cell.name: ODR_STS_TYP_val
cell.description: オーダ状態区分 値

cell.name: DM_STS_TYP_name

cell.name: DM_STS_TYP_val
cell.description: デマンド状態区分 値
